title: ЛАПТОП HP VICTUS 15-FA1026NN I7-13700H/16GB/512GB/RTX 4050 6GB
description:
Лаптоп

Процесор:Intel® Core™ i7-13700H (up to 5.0 GHz with Intel® Turbo Boost Technology, 24 MB L3 cache, 14 cores, 20 threads)

Wi-Fi 6 MT7921 (2x2) + Bluetooth® 5.3
